ArgonTest.Name: Print class parameter instance method base class
ArgonTest.InputSource:
import Argon.Core/*
open class MyClass1(str: String) <: Object
public new() end
public proc _.printMessage(): Unit = puts str
end
class MyClass2(str: String) <: MyClass1(str) public new() initialize _ = MyClass1(str).new() end end
proc main(): Unit do MyClass2('Hello World').new().printMessage() end
